#labels Phase-Deploy
This doc contains simple instructions for QA testers to install pre-release versions of Dark Nova on their devices.

= Introduction =

For first time testers, you must first download the "Provisioing Profile" then install the game.


= Instructions =

  # Download the provisioning profile from the downloads section here http://darknova-iphone.googlecode.com/files/DN_Ad_Hoc_1215b.mobileprovision
  # Download a Dark Nova pre-release version from the downloads section.
  # Launch Itunes
  # Drop the provisioning profile on to the iTunes window
  # Drop the .ipa file (Dark Nova) on to the iTunes window
  # Sync your device.
